title: #329: Reflections on 9/11
description:
Today we are posting our reflections on the attack on our country on 9/11/2001, twenty years after the immense tragedy. Lisa was in New York City that day, Jim was at Quantico. They both recount their experiences that day and in the chaotic days afterward. Jim talks about his new podcast on Audible, called "After The Fall" which sheds new light on the events leading up to the horrific terrorist attack.

Listen here: https://www.audible.com/pd/After-the-Fall-Podcast/B09F4KFZVB

Correction: Lisa meant to say Windows on the World, not The Rainbow Room, when referring to the restaurant in the World Trade Center.


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
